title: Movie Theaters Are Reopening. Is America Ready? Plus: RZA!
description:
In 44 states around the country, movie theaters will reopen their doors this weekend for the release of the Russell Crowe thriller 'Unhinged,' a controversial decision by the major theater chains. Amanda and Sean talk about the ramifications of the decision, what it means for the release of Christopher Nolan's long-awaited 'Tenet,' and whether society has officially acclimated to at-home viewing (2:47). Then, Sean is joined by Wu-Tang Clan founder and filmmaker RZA to talk about his new movie 'Cut Throat City' (51:18).

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: RZA
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
